title: Mouse Buttons 4 & 5 No longer work in league after windows 10 update? but work outside of league.
body: So before i updated windows 10 to the current update my mouse buttons in league worked fine , but now league doesnt pick them up at all , like they work completely fine out of league but cant use them anymore in league? any fix.

replies.body: There's an issue currently with the recent Creator update that's preventing the additional keys from binding.  We haven't found a more concrete fix yet, but have found that rolling back the update will fix this up.  Hang tight for now!
Same problem here and I'm seeing lots of people with the same problem popping up in older threads too. Only affects league.
